metadata.name: Firefall 2023
metadata.description:
Amidst the rugged cliffs of Yosemite,  
A wondrous sight appears for all to 
see, Horsetail Falls, a cascade of light,  
A fiery flow, an orange delight.

As the sun begins to set,  
Its rays dance upon the water's wet,  
And in that moment, a transformation,  
As if the falls burst into combustion.

The flames of red and gold aglow,  
A fiery cascade, a stunning show,  
Nature's canvas, a work of art,  
A sight that will forever warm your heart.

Oh, Yosemite, your horsetail falls,  
A wonder to behold, a sight that enthralls,  
As the sun sets and the fire falls, 
Your beauty forever calls.-VFP

attributes.value: GF100-200mmF5.6 R LM OIS WR f/5.7
